entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
